body_paragraphs: Welcome to "Distributing Your Savings." This slide [139] is the third of a twelve-segment educational series called "Preparing for Retirement."

This series provides only [140] advice. It should not replace the guidance of your investment planner. The series has been developed as background material to help you ask key questions when [141] with your investment planner. We hope you find this information helpful.

questions.text:
(A) You are encouraged to visit our office
for a free portfolio review.
(B) The series is designed to help you
make informed financial decisions.
(C) Please fill out the paperwork before
your appointment.
(D) Your responses will help us serve you
better in the future.
